abstract: University of California, Los Angeles, reinstates suspended cornerback Ishmael Adams after it is learned that he will not face felony charges in robbery case; other college football news noted.
lead_paragraph: The junior cornerback Ishmael Adams had been arrested on suspicion of robbery and missed three games while suspended.

headline.main: U.C.L.A. Player Returns After Arrest and Suspension

snippet: The junior cornerback Ishmael Adams had been arrested on suspicion of robbery and missed three games while suspended.
